TopicTitle: challenging career mod (what are your ideas)?

Articles.Content:
Hey crazies!

 

I was thinking of a mod, where the control capabilities have to be developed during the career mode as well:

 

- At the beginning you have to control the rockets only on old monitors in mission control, showing you basic flight attributes (speed, direction, height) and give you few control (e.g. staging, signal starting)

- Adding a camera device to the vessel but initially deal with low quality / bandwidth

- Controlling the flight "remotely" from mission control and get more sensors attached to your vessels, allowing to detect  celestial bodies (you have to DISCOVER the space arround you in small steps)

- Getting more elaborated tools for modeling the space around you to be able for maneuver predictions

 

My idea is, that this remote-feeling of running a mission like mars rover, with delays on the camera picture, dealing with blind spots etc etc.

 

do you have further ideas? would you love such a feature in a future KSP ?

 

thanks for your opinions!
